sqlquery.name: kpi.surrender.dealPercent
sqlquery.select: select #persongroupfieldname# bmName, #persongroupfieldid# gid, sum(case when c800030607 = '解决' then 1 else 0 end) 解决工单, sum(case when c800030607 = '未解决' then 1 else 0 end) 未解决工单, count(*) 工单总数 from (select dp2.c700020002,dp2.c700020001,#persongroupfieldid#,#persongroupfieldname# from( select dp2.c1, dp2.c700020001, #persongroupfieldid#, #persongroupfieldname#, dp2.c700020017, dp2.c700020002 from (select c700020001, c700020002, max(c700020017) as c700020017 from {WF:App_DealProcess} where c700020002 = 'WF:EL_TTM_CCH' and (c700020003 = 'dp_2' or c700020003 = 'dp_5') and c700020017>0 group by c700020001, c700020002) dp1, {WF:App_DealProcess} dp2 where dp1.c700020001 = dp2.c700020001 and dp1.c700020002 = dp2.c700020002 and dp1.c700020017 = dp2.c700020017 and dp2.c700020002 = 'WF:EL_TTM_CCH' and (dp2.c700020003 = 'dp_2' or dp2.c700020003 = 'dp_5') ) dp2, {WF:EL_TTM_CCH} tSurrender where dp2.c700020001 = tSurrender.c1 and dp2.c700020002 = 'WF:EL_TTM_CCH' and (tSurrender.c700000010 = '已归档' or tSurrender.c700000010 = '处理完成待归档') #persongroup# #seltime# group by dp2.c700020001,dp2.c700020002,#persongroupfieldid#,#persongroupfieldname# ) dp2 , {WF:EL_TTM_CCH} tSurrender where dp2.c700020001 = tSurrender.c1 and dp2.c700020002 = 'WF:EL_TTM_CCH' and dp2.c700020002 = tSurrender.c700000001 group by #persongroupfieldid#,#persongroupfieldname#

sqlquery.name: kpi.surrender.dealPercentDetail
sqlquery.select: select /*COUNT*/ tSurrender.c1 baseid, tSurrender.c700000003 as 工单编号, to_char(TO_DATE('19700101', 'yyyymmdd') + tSurrender.c700000006 / 86400 + 8 / 24, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:MI:ss') 建单时间, tSurrender.c700000004 as 建单人, tSurrender.c700000011 as 主题, tSurrender.c700000015 as 紧急程度, tSurrender.c700000014 as 所属专业, tSurrender.c700000010 as 工单状态 /*COUNT*/ from (select dp2.c1, dp2.c700020001, #persongroupfield#, dp2.c700020017, dp2.c700020002 from (select c700020001, c700020002, max(c700020017) as c700020017 from {WF:App_DealProcess} where c700020002 = 'WF:EL_TTM_CCH' and (c700020003 = 'dp_2' or c700020003 = 'dp_5') and c700020017 > 0 group by c700020001, c700020002) dp1, {WF:App_DealProcess} dp2 where dp1.c700020001 = dp2.c700020001 and dp1.c700020002 = dp2.c700020002 and dp1.c700020017 = dp2.c700020017 and dp2.c700020002 = 'WF:EL_TTM_CCH' and (dp2.c700020003 = 'dp_2' or dp2.c700020003 = 'dp_5')) dp2, {WF:EL_TTM_CCH} tSurrender where dp2.c700020001 = tSurrender.c1 and dp2.c700020002 = tSurrender.c700000001 and dp2.c700020002 = 'WF:EL_TTM_CCH' and (tSurrender.c700000010 = '已归档' or tSurrender.c700000010 = '处理完成待归档') and c800030607 = '解决' #persongroupfieldid# #seltime# order by tSurrender.c700000003 desc

sqlquery.name: kpi.surrender.nodealPercentDetail
sqlquery.select: select /*COUNT*/ tSurrender.c1 baseid, tSurrender.c700000003 as 工单编号, to_char(TO_DATE('19700101', 'yyyymmdd') + tSurrender.c700000006 / 86400 + 8 / 24, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:MI:ss') 建单时间, tSurrender.c700000004 as 建单人, tSurrender.c700000011 as 主题, tSurrender.c700000015 as 紧急程度, tSurrender.c700000014 as 所属专业, tSurrender.c700000010 as 工单状态 /*COUNT*/ from (select dp2.c1, dp2.c700020001, #persongroupfield#, dp2.c700020017, dp2.c700020002 from (select c700020001, c700020002, max(c700020017) as c700020017 from {WF:App_DealProcess} where c700020002 = 'WF:EL_TTM_CCH' and (c700020003 = 'dp_2' or c700020003 = 'dp_5') and c700020017 > 0 group by c700020001, c700020002) dp1, {WF:App_DealProcess} dp2 where dp1.c700020001 = dp2.c700020001 and dp1.c700020002 = dp2.c700020002 and dp1.c700020017 = dp2.c700020017 and dp2.c700020002 = 'WF:EL_TTM_CCH' and (dp2.c700020003 = 'dp_2' or dp2.c700020003 = 'dp_5')) dp2, {WF:EL_TTM_CCH} tSurrender where dp2.c700020001 = tSurrender.c1 and dp2.c700020002 = tSurrender.c700000001 and dp2.c700020002 = 'WF:EL_TTM_CCH' and (tSurrender.c700000010 = '已归档' or tSurrender.c700000010 = '处理完成待归档') and c800030607 = '未解决' #persongroupfieldid# #seltime# order by tSurrender.c700000003 desc

sqlquery.name: kpi.surrender.dealPercentTotalDetail
sqlquery.select: select /*COUNT*/ tSurrender.c1 baseid, tSurrender.c700000003 as 工单编号, to_char(TO_DATE('19700101', 'yyyymmdd') + tSurrender.c700000006 / 86400 + 8 / 24, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:MI:ss') 建单时间, tSurrender.c700000004 as 建单人, tSurrender.c700000011 as 主题, tSurrender.c700000015 as 紧急程度, tSurrender.c700000014 as 所属专业, tSurrender.c700000010 as 工单状态 /*COUNT*/ from (select dp2.c1, dp2.c700020001, #persongroupfield#, dp2.c700020017, dp2.c700020002 from (select c700020001, c700020002, max(c700020017) as c700020017 from {WF:App_DealProcess} where c700020002 = 'WF:EL_TTM_CCH' and (c700020003 = 'dp_2' or c700020003 = 'dp_5') and c700020017 > 0 group by c700020001, c700020002) dp1, {WF:App_DealProcess} dp2 where dp1.c700020001 = dp2.c700020001 and dp1.c700020002 = dp2.c700020002 and dp1.c700020017 = dp2.c700020017 and dp2.c700020002 = 'WF:EL_TTM_CCH' and (dp2.c700020003 = 'dp_2' or dp2.c700020003 = 'dp_5')) dp2, {WF:EL_TTM_CCH} tSurrender where dp2.c700020001 = tSurrender.c1 and dp2.c700020002 = tSurrender.c700000001 and dp2.c700020002 = 'WF:EL_TTM_CCH' and (tSurrender.c700000010 = '已归档' or tSurrender.c700000010 = '处理完成待归档') #persongroupfieldid# #seltime# order by tSurrender.c700000003 desc

sqlquery.name: kpi.surrender.dealPercentWait
sqlquery.select: select #persongroupfieldname# bmName, #persongroupfieldid# gid, sum(case when c800030607 = '解决' then 1 else 0 end) 解决工单, sum(case when c800030607 = '未解决' then 1 else 0 end) 未解决工单, count(*) 工单总数 from (select dp2.c700020002,dp2.c700020001,#persongroupfieldid#,#persongroupfieldname# from( select dp2.c1, dp2.c700020001, #persongroupfieldid#, #persongroupfieldname#, dp2.c700020017, dp2.c700020002 from (select c700020001, c700020002, max(c700020017) as c700020017 from {WF:App_DealProcess} where c700020002 = 'WF:EL_TTM_CCH' and (c700020003 = 'dp_2' or c700020003 = 'dp_5') and c700020017>0 group by c700020001, c700020002) dp1, {WF:App_DealProcess} dp2 where dp1.c700020001 = dp2.c700020001 and dp1.c700020002 = dp2.c700020002 and dp1.c700020017 = dp2.c700020017 and dp2.c700020002 = 'WF:EL_TTM_CCH' and (dp2.c700020003 = 'dp_2' or dp2.c700020003 = 'dp_5') ) dp2, {WF:EL_TTM_CCH} tSurrender where dp2.c700020001 = tSurrender.c1 and dp2.c700020002 = 'WF:EL_TTM_CCH' and (tSurrender.c700000010 = '已归档' or tSurrender.c700000010 = '处理完成待归档' or tSurrender.c700000010 = '待归档') #persongroup# and tSurrender.C1 in (select t.c700020001 from T331 t where t.c700020003 = 'dp_7' and t.C700020077 = 1 #seltime#) group by dp2.c700020001,dp2.c700020002,#persongroupfieldid#,#persongroupfieldname# ) dp2 , {WF:EL_TTM_CCH} tSurrender where dp2.c700020001 = tSurrender.c1 and dp2.c700020002 = 'WF:EL_TTM_CCH' and dp2.c700020002 = tSurrender.c700000001 group by #persongroupfieldid#,#persongroupfieldname#

sqlquery.name: kpi.surrender.dealPercentDetailWait
sqlquery.select: select /*COUNT*/ tSurrender.c1 baseid, tSurrender.c700000003 as 工单编号, to_char(TO_DATE('19700101', 'yyyymmdd') + tSurrender.c700000006 / 86400 + 8 / 24, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:MI:ss') 建单时间, tSurrender.c700000004 as 建单人, tSurrender.c700000011 as 主题, tSurrender.c700000015 as 紧急程度, tSurrender.c700000014 as 所属专业, tSurrender.c700000010 as 工单状态 /*COUNT*/ from (select dp2.c1, dp2.c700020001, #persongroupfield#, dp2.c700020017, dp2.c700020002 from (select c700020001, c700020002, max(c700020017) as c700020017 from {WF:App_DealProcess} where c700020002 = 'WF:EL_TTM_CCH' and (c700020003 = 'dp_2' or c700020003 = 'dp_5') and c700020017 > 0 group by c700020001, c700020002) dp1, {WF:App_DealProcess} dp2 where dp1.c700020001 = dp2.c700020001 and dp1.c700020002 = dp2.c700020002 and dp1.c700020017 = dp2.c700020017 and dp2.c700020002 = 'WF:EL_TTM_CCH' and (dp2.c700020003 = 'dp_2' or dp2.c700020003 = 'dp_5')) dp2, {WF:EL_TTM_CCH} tSurrender where dp2.c700020001 = tSurrender.c1 and dp2.c700020002 = tSurrender.c700000001 and dp2.c700020002 = 'WF:EL_TTM_CCH' and (tSurrender.c700000010 = '已归档' or tSurrender.c700000010 = '处理完成待归档' or tSurrender.c700000010 = '待归档') and c800030607 = '解决' #persongroupfieldid# and tSurrender.C1 in (select t.c700020001 from T331 t where t.c700020003 = 'dp_7' and t.C700020077 = 1 #seltime#) order by tSurrender.c700000003 desc

sqlquery.name: kpi.surrender.nodealPercentDetailWait
sqlquery.select: select /*COUNT*/ tSurrender.c1 baseid, tSurrender.c700000003 as 工单编号, to_char(TO_DATE('19700101', 'yyyymmdd') + tSurrender.c700000006 / 86400 + 8 / 24, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:MI:ss') 建单时间, tSurrender.c700000004 as 建单人, tSurrender.c700000011 as 主题, tSurrender.c700000015 as 紧急程度, tSurrender.c700000014 as 所属专业, tSurrender.c700000010 as 工单状态 /*COUNT*/ from (select dp2.c1, dp2.c700020001, #persongroupfield#, dp2.c700020017, dp2.c700020002 from (select c700020001, c700020002, max(c700020017) as c700020017 from {WF:App_DealProcess} where c700020002 = 'WF:EL_TTM_CCH' and (c700020003 = 'dp_2' or c700020003 = 'dp_5') and c700020017 > 0 group by c700020001, c700020002) dp1, {WF:App_DealProcess} dp2 where dp1.c700020001 = dp2.c700020001 and dp1.c700020002 = dp2.c700020002 and dp1.c700020017 = dp2.c700020017 and dp2.c700020002 = 'WF:EL_TTM_CCH' and (dp2.c700020003 = 'dp_2' or dp2.c700020003 = 'dp_5')) dp2, {WF:EL_TTM_CCH} tSurrender where dp2.c700020001 = tSurrender.c1 and dp2.c700020002 = tSurrender.c700000001 and dp2.c700020002 = 'WF:EL_TTM_CCH' and (tSurrender.c700000010 = '已归档' or tSurrender.c700000010 = '处理完成待归档' or tSurrender.c700000010 = '待归档') and c800030607 = '未解决' #persongroupfieldid# and tSurrender.C1 in (select t.c700020001 from T331 t where t.c700020003 = 'dp_7' and t.C700020077 = 1 #seltime#) order by tSurrender.c700000003 desc

sqlquery.name: kpi.surrender.dealPercentTotalDetailWait
sqlquery.select: select /*COUNT*/ tSurrender.c1 baseid, tSurrender.c700000003 as 工单编号, to_char(TO_DATE('19700101', 'yyyymmdd') + tSurrender.c700000006 / 86400 + 8 / 24, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:MI:ss') 建单时间, tSurrender.c700000004 as 建单人, tSurrender.c700000011 as 主题, tSurrender.c700000015 as 紧急程度, tSurrender.c700000014 as 所属专业, tSurrender.c700000010 as 工单状态 /*COUNT*/ from (select dp2.c1, dp2.c700020001, #persongroupfield#, dp2.c700020017, dp2.c700020002 from (select c700020001, c700020002, max(c700020017) as c700020017 from {WF:App_DealProcess} where c700020002 = 'WF:EL_TTM_CCH' and (c700020003 = 'dp_2' or c700020003 = 'dp_5') and c700020017 > 0 group by c700020001, c700020002) dp1, {WF:App_DealProcess} dp2 where dp1.c700020001 = dp2.c700020001 and dp1.c700020002 = dp2.c700020002 and dp1.c700020017 = dp2.c700020017 and dp2.c700020002 = 'WF:EL_TTM_CCH' and (dp2.c700020003 = 'dp_2' or dp2.c700020003 = 'dp_5')) dp2, {WF:EL_TTM_CCH} tSurrender where dp2.c700020001 = tSurrender.c1 and dp2.c700020002 = tSurrender.c700000001 and dp2.c700020002 = 'WF:EL_TTM_CCH' and (tSurrender.c700000010 = '已归档' or tSurrender.c700000010 = '处理完成待归档' or tSurrender.c700000010 = '待归档') #persongroupfieldid# and tSurrender.C1 in (select t.c700020001 from T331 t where t.c700020003 = 'dp_7' and t.C700020077 = 1 #seltime#) order by tSurrender.c700000003 desc
